155.title: üéµ Lucas‚Äôs Recommended Recordings
155.content: Welcome to my personal guide to classical music ‚Äî a curated collection of the recordings I return to most. This site is the opposite of Apple Music Classical, which tries to list every existing recording of every classical work. I take a different approach: for each piece I love, I‚Äôve chosen just one recording that I believe stands out ‚Äî the version I recommend you actually listen to. I usually prefer modern, high-resolution studio recordings over historic public performances. I‚Äôm not generally drawn to period instruments, though there are exceptions. Where possible, I‚Äôve included links to the albums on Tidal (your browser may give you the choice to open the link in another streaming platform like Spotify). Everything here reflects my personal taste (listen to my üíé gems!), not any kind of critical consensus. If a piece is listed without a recording, I‚Äôm open to suggestions ‚Äî feel free to share your favorites.
